entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
